messages.message: Don't know where to put this but have a major issue with 24.04.3 in that it errors out when trying to create an Organization Space in the Admin App
@Dale DeLoy we are deploying 24.04.5 to prod shortly, let's see if that fixes this, if not we will raise a GA blocker and get folks look into this ASAP
@Dale DeLoy and just to confirm, you encounter this issue on platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) or a dedicated sandbox?
dedicated sandbox - have not tried on platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com)
I can't find the original thread but we saw this before and the reason was the db migration action failed after upgrade
amnat.internal.instabase.com (http://amnat.internal.instabase.com) is the sandbox
Could be there was an issue in generation
ok. dbmigrate succeeded in this sandbox
@Dale DeLoy do you want me to upgrade http://amnat.internal.instabase.com/ to 24.04.5 to see if that will resolve it?
Launched a new environment with 24.04.5 and got same issue

@Dale DeLoy can you file a jira? we may have to track this as a GA blocker now for 24.04 GA next week until further investigation, thanks! <!subteam^S02FJA6A7U5> can we get somebody look into this and see if this is a config thing or require code change? cc @Ram Prasanna
@Dale DeLoy do you know why I kept on getting 502 bad gateway when loading the env? Trying to look further but i can't
It hibernated for lack of use
Do you want me to bring it up and create a user for you?
yea, that'd be great!
site is back up and i created a user using your email
made you site admin
hm. i was able to create an org space
I am now able to as well - might have been something with the restart
To clarify, this is a non issue at this point, correct?
yeah looks like it is resolved now by itself potentially, @Xindi Xu can you give a quick try on platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) to verify? :pray:
yep, it works
